title: The Fast and the Furious
alt: Sometimes when I steer shopping carts around corners, I slide them a little and pretend I'm getting the blue spark boost.
transcript:
on the other side of the world
a new style of street racing
rules the tokyo underground
the cars are lighter
the tires are slick
when you drift,
if you ain't out of control,
you ain't in control.
and if you work the wheel
back and forth just right,[Two cars race around a corner with blue sparks spraying from their tires.]
You get blue sparks.The FAST and the FURIOUS: TOKYO DASH!!
